Dune::ALU3dGridGeometry

Dune::ALU3dGridGeometry< mydim, cdim, GridImp > Class Template Reference

#include <geometry.hh>

Inheritance diagram for Dune::ALU3dGridGeometry< mydim, cdim, GridImp >:

List of all members.

Detailed Description

template<int mydim, int cdim, class GridImp>
class Dune::ALU3dGridGeometry< mydim, cdim, GridImp >

Defines the geometry part of a mesh entity. Works for all dimensions, element types and dimensions of world. Provides reference element and mapping between local and global coordinates. The element may have different implementations because the mapping can be done more efficient for structured meshes than for unstructured meshes.

dim: An element is a polygonal in a hyperplane of dimension dim. 0 <= dim <= 3 is typically dim=0 is a point.

dimworld: Each corner is a point with dimworld coordinates. ALU3dGridGeometry Empty definition, needs to be specialized for element type


Public Member Functions

alu3d_ctype volume () const
 return volume of the geometry
